newsitem.title: USA: Helm Resources sees gain on sale.
newsitem.headline: Helm Resources sees gain on sale.

text.p: Helm Resources Inc said Friday that its Interpak Holdings Inc subsidiary completed the sale of its Interpak Terminals unit to Katoen Natie U.S.A.
Helm said in a statement that it expects to record a gain from the sale, but did not disclose the amount.

The company said it sold the unit, whose primary business is the custom packaging, warehousing, and distribution of resin pellet byproducts of the petrochemical industry, for an undisclosed amount of cash and debt assumption.
Katoen Natie U.S.A. is a subsidiary of a privately held Belgian corporation.
